name: magnet-picker
description: Chrome extension for parsing and saving magnet links from specific websites

scripts.build: npm run generate-icons && webpack && npm run copy-static && npm run check-build
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run watch
scripts.copy-static: powershell -Command "New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path dist/content/styles, dist/assets, dist/popup, dist/options; Get-Content src/content/styles/button.css, src/content/styles/panel.css, src/content/styles/item.css, src/content/styles/toast.css, src/content/styles/scrollbar.css, src/content/styles/animations.css, src/content/styles/theme-light.css, src/content/styles/theme-dark.css | Set-Content dist/content/styles/index.css; Copy-Item -Force src/manifest.json dist/; Copy-Item -Force src/assets/* dist/assets/; Copy-Item -Force src/popup/popup.html dist/popup/; Copy-Item -Force src/popup/popup.css dist/popup/; Copy-Item -Force src/options/options.html dist/options/; Copy-Item -Force src/options/options.css dist/options/"
